randomQuestions.one: What does a chest X-ray show?
randomQuestions.two: What are the common symptoms of a heart attack?
randomQuestions.three: How can I lower my blood pressure naturally?
randomQuestions.four: What is the difference between an MRI and a CT scan?
randomQuestions.five: What are the early signs of diabetes?
randomQuestions.six: How do I interpret my basic blood test results?
randomQuestions.seven: What is the treatment for a urinary tract infection (UTI)?
randomQuestions.eight: Can you explain what an echocardiogram is used for?
randomQuestions.nine: What are the guidelines for a healthy diet?
randomQuestions.eleven: How is a brain tumor detected on an MRI?
randomQuestions.twelve: What is the role of family medicine?
randomQuestions.thirteen: What are the risk factors for a stroke?
randomQuestions.fourteen: How to manage anxiety and stress?
randomQuestions.fifteen: What are the latest guidelines for managing hypertension?

disclaimerScreen.heading: Important Medical Disclaimer
disclaimerScreen.subheading: Doctor Med AI is designed for radiology professionals, healthcare experts, medical students, and enthusiasts
disclaimerScreen.consentAgreement: I have read and consent to the disclaimer.
disclaimerScreen.firstConsent: Doctor Med AI does not provide health measurements or treatment advice, nor is it intended for such purposes. Users of Doctor Med AI must apply their clinical judgment and verify information from authoritative sources before making any clinical decisions.
disclaimerScreen.secondConsent: Doctor Med AI is not a diagnostic tool, treatment platform, or a replacement for professional medical advice. It offers AI-generated insights to assist healthcare professionals in accessing medical knowledge and analyzing medical images and documents. Doctor Med AI is an AI-driven informational and educational app designed more to support licensed healthcare professionals.
disclaimerScreen.thirdConsent: Doctor Med AI is not designed for patient use. It does not provide direct medical diagnoses, treatment recommendations, or patient management functionalities.
disclaimerScreen.fourthConsent: Doctor Med AI is not classified as a medical device and does not claim regulatory approval. It is intended for educational and informational purposes to complement professional expertise.
disclaimerScreen.fifthConsent: Doctor Med AI does not collect, store, or process personal or patient data. All user interactions are confidential and limited to the scope of the app.

contactUs.heading: Feel free to email us directly, and our team will get back to you as soon as possible
